title: centered' AI to boost agriculture, public health

content:

title: ‘It sounds like sci-fi’ -- but Ohio’s AI marriage ban might not be so crazy
description: Today in Ohio podcast reveals how a seemingly absurd law banning humans from marrying AI is actually a critical legal measure to prevent artificial intelligence from gaining "personhood" rights.
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- It might sound like a plot from a science fiction movie, but a new Ohio bill banning humans from marrying artificial intelligence is addressing a very real concern – just not the one you might think.

title: These jobs are staying safe amid the AI boom, experts say
description: Artificial intelligence will impact industries differently, with software and finance facing more automation than healthcare, construction and skilled trades.
content:
There is growing concern among today's workforce that they will be swiftly replaced by artificial intelligence as the technology, which has touched nearly every corner of the economy, continues to advance.

title: Trump's ballroom vision has some glaring design flaws, analysis reveals
description: Artificial intelligence may not be to blame, according to a new analysis.
content:
The design plans for President Donald Trump’s new ballroom are riddled with inconsistencies — and artificial intelligence doesn’t appear to be the culprit, according to a new analysis by The Verge.

title: Where does human thinking end and AI begin? An AI authorship protocol aims to show the difference
description: The latest generation of artificial intelligence models is sharper and smoother, producing polished text with fewer errors and hallucinations. As a philosophy professor, I have a growing fear: When a polished essay no longer shows that a student did the thinking, the grade above it becomes hollow—and so does the diploma.

title: No more turbulence as airline makes major change to reduce risk of bumpy flights
description: Good news for nervous flyers, as a major airline is using artificial intelligence to try and reduce the risk of turbulent and bumpy flights.
content:
